snippet: Despite millions of users, apps are not a surefire moneymaker for cautious studios.
abstract: Hollywood is watching to see if smartphone apps can become hit movies and television shows; mobile start-up Outfit7 is behind Talking Friends, popular collection of 19 cartoon apps, which have about 500 million global downloads and more than 120 million active monthly users; Outfit7 is pursuing movie and TV deals based on its characters.
lead_paragraph: Despite millions of users, apps are not a surefire moneymaker for cautious studios.

headline.seo: Hollywood Ponders a Path From App to Hit Show
headline.main: Dicey Path From App to Hit Show
headline.print_headline: Dicey Path From App To Hit Show
